Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main class of the "The Chase" application. "The Chase" is a very simple, text based adventure game. Users can walk around some scenery, talk to characters, pick up items, shoot people, participate in certain action packed events and more! This main class creates and initializes all the others: it creates a player object, creates the parser and starts the game. It also prints a welcome message at the start of the game.
    Version:
    2013.12.18
    Author:
    Viktor Holmér

      • getParser

        public Parser getParser()
        Simply returns the parser of the game object.
        Returns:
        The parser of this instance of the game class.

      • play

        public void play()
        Main play routine. Loops until end of play. Or until quitGame() is called, which sets quitBoolean to false.

        Print out the opening message for the player.
